content: *this is a crochet pattern and not the finished item* this pattern includes - step by step instruction - instruction are written in english language - instant digital download - ready to download immediately after the payment you will see the download link in details of your order skill level intermediate measurement approximately 7cm tall handmade with 100% cotton hook 3 0 mm other material fiber fill scissor yarn needle enjoy this pattern ♥ thanks for visited my shop ♥ notes ♥ you may sell the finished product but please give credit to the designer andesigncraft ♥ size of the finished doll varies with the hook s size type of yarn and tightness of stitch copyright © 2023 andesigncraft all rights reserved no part of this file may be reproduced distributed or transmitted in any form or by any means including photocopying recording or other electronic or mechanical methods without prior written permission from the author creations made from this pattern may be sold provided that credit is given to the designer of this pattern andesigncraft
